TopicTitle: Office 365 for student: problem with activating

Articles.Content:
i have problem with activating it, i make isic card to activate that bloody thing

But when i I tried to provide mi ISIC card nuber it doesn't work, so i i decided to send scan of my student id card issued by mi Wroclaw University to Microsoft, how long it can take?

Huh, you better ask some other polish student that already did this.

However there are pretty good alternatives to MS Office. You could try http://www.libreoffice.org/ for free.

It should have everything the MS Office Package has. And it is open source.

Huh, you better ask some other polish student that already did this.

However there are pretty good alternatives to MS Office. You could try http://www.libreoffice.org/ for free.

It should have everything the MS Office Package has. And it is open source.

I'd also like to plug Apache OpenOffice. It's similar, and as far as I can tell has about the same interface as LO, but it's about 1/2 the download size (134 MB Windows OpenOffice/206 MB Windows LibreOffice).

As for your problem, ask your university's technical support/IT department if they have one or another student who has succeeded in obtaining the free application for help.

Huh, you better ask some other polish student that already did this.

However there are pretty good alternatives to MS Office. You could try http://www.libreoffice.org/ for free.

It should have everything the MS Office Package has. And it is open source.

With Microsoft Office i get 60 minutes for skype-telephone call and 20 GB on OneDrive.
